body:
The Ladybug_Shading Mask component allows to define the Sky View Factor starting from a 3D model.

The [Rayman software](http://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s00484-006-0061-8) or [other sw](http://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s00704-011-0402-3) allow to do the same starting from a real image captured with a fish-eye.

I have seen if in ladybug there is a specific component but I have not found it. So I ask: "have you considered to implement this features in ladybug?"



Regards,

Francesco
topic: Sky View Factor calculation: different possible approaches.
